PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElectricFlowStorageDeviceTypeBattery
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of batteries. The property set can be used by the predefined type BATTERY of IfcElectricFlowStorageDevice.

PropertyDef.Name: CurrentRegulationRate
PropertyDef.Definition: It shows the ability of DC regulated power supply to suppress the fluctuation of output voltage caused by the change of load current (output current) when the input voltage is constant.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSupplyCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal current of the supply.

PropertyDef.Name: VoltageRegulationRate
PropertyDef.Definition: When the input side voltage changes from the lowest allowable input value to the specified maximum value, the relative change value of the output voltage is the percentage of the rated output voltage.

PropertyDef.Name: AssemblyInstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Instructions to describe how the system / equipment / facility is assembled.

PropertyDef.Name: BatteryChargingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of battery charging.

PropertyDef.Name: EncapsulationTechnologyCode
PropertyDef.Definition: Code indicating the encapsulation technology which has been applied in an electric, electronic or electromechanical component.

PropertyDef.Name: OpenCircuitVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: Voltage of a cell or battery when the discharge current is zero [Source IEC 482-03-32]
